>Construction of pCSC1
//P_cscA driving amilGFP
acquire oligo csc1
acquire oligo csc2
acquire oligo csc3
acquire oligo csc4
acquire plasmid Mach1_gen
acquire plasmid p20N91
PCR csc1,csc2 on p20N91	(2907bp, amil)
PCR csc3,csc4 on Mach1_gen	(210bp, PcscA)
Assemble amil,PcscA	(BsmBI, pCSC1)
Transform pCSC1	(Mach1, Kan)
---
>csc1
ccataCGTCTCaCGTTggatccaaataggagaaatac
>csc2
cagtcCGTCTCtCAGACGCTCTGAGGTATTATTCGC
>csc3
ccataCGTCTCaTCTGtaaattcatctgagttacgc
>csc4
cagtcCGTCTCtAACGcctggttaagcaaatttggtg
>Mach1_gen
